plot: A film that confronts family issues, drugs, and racism through the eyes of a young artist. His home is no longer what it was, must we live in the past or correct our mistakes to create a brighter future?
title: The Pines
plot_es: A film that confronts family issues, drugs, and racism through the eyes of a young artist. His home is no longer what it was, must we live in the past or correct our mistakes to create a brighter future?
plot_en: A film that confronts family issues, drugs, and racism through the eyes of a young artist. His home is no longer what it was, must we live in the past or correct our mistakes to create a brighter future?
